name: Poker Pocket
description:
A brand new way to enjoy poker for everyone: no chips, no bet, instant play, progress at your own pace and get skills.

As a daily instant routine (5-minute session), the game helps you to improve your Focus, Memory, Concentration, Quick Decision making, Attention control and Memorize patterns.

Whether a pro or just a casual cards player, you'll love this original version of the game.

Play 1-on-1 and create 5 poker hands with your cards.
Take turns drawing and playing a card. The cards in the center column belong to both players. Play 4 cards in each row on your side. Build up better poker hands than your opponent on at least 3 lines (out of 5) to win the game.

• Statistics & Achievements - full stats tracking to quantify your game
• AI cards recommandation
• Level-up and prepare yourself to be a Champion
• Create your profile (Nickname, Avatar...)

• Poker Pocket contains banner, interstitial, and rewarded-video ads.

• Poker Pocket is available in English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

• Designed for iPhone and iPad.
